snippet: GORDON--Adrienne L. May 20, 1933-March 14, 2016. To the jewel of our family, whose beauty was both inside and out, you will be greatly missed and remembered. Adrienne was the beloved wife of the late Walter Gordon for 59 years, mother of Gregory and Scott, mother-in-law to Beth and Erika, grandmother to Ross, Shirlee, Andrew, Lauren, Jonathan, Francesca, Samantha and Alexandra, great-grandmother to Cooper, Cody, Emerson, Georgia and Avery, and sister of Steven Tobin. May her memory be a blessing. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GORDON, ADRIENNE L
